name: @aethercore/linux-agent
description: AetherCore Linux/Pi Identity Agent - CodeRalphie Warhead Build

scripts.build:warhead: npm run build && pkg dist/index.js --targets node18-linux-arm64 --output dist/coderalphie-linux-arm64 --compress GZip
scripts.package:payloads: bash -c 'mkdir -p ../../packages/dashboard/src-tauri/resources/payloads && cp dist/coderalphie-linux-arm64 ../../packages/dashboard/src-tauri/resources/payloads/ && cp install.sh ../../packages/dashboard/src-tauri/resources/payloads/ && echo "Payloads copied to dashboard resources"'
scripts.build:full: npm run build:warhead && npm run package:payloads

author: AetherCore Team
